Sql.CDATA:
-- table UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory') BEGIN PRINT 'Create table UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory' CREATE TABLE [dbo].UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory( [CompanyID] [int] NOT NULL ,[TranID] [bigint] NOT NULL ,[PMReassignmentID] [nvarchar] (15) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CompanyID] ASC, [TranID] ASC ) WITH ( PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON ))
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_UsrPMCostReassignment_UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory] FOREIGN KEY([CompanyID], [PMReassignmentID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignment] ([CompanyID], [PMReassignmentID])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_UsrPMCostReassignment_UsrPMCostReassignmentHistory]
END
